channel.title: Need Help Portforwarding
channel.description: I Need help port forwarding. i recently got a new router and i dont know how to portforward on it.

item.title: Need Help Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:7, topic:481689”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=599926.msg4214897#msg4214897 date=1360109990]

www.portforward.com

AFTER you turn the server online:
check to see if you did it correctly:
www.canyouseeme.org

canyouseeme.org only checks for a broadcast on the port, Fridder.
[/quote]

I thought someone with common sense would know that and I wouldn’t need to include it.[/quote]
You’re kidding right?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:481689”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=599926.msg4214853#msg4214853 date=1360105678]
www.portforward.com

AFTER you turn the server online:
check to see if you did it correctly:
www.canyouseeme.org
[/quote]
canyouseeme.org only checks for a broadcast on the port, Fridder.[/quote]

I thought someone with common sense would know that and I wouldn’t need to include it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @brian_h brian h
item.description:
@brian_h wrote:

Open CMD.
ipconfig
Type in your web address bar the default gateway ip it shows
Should open your routers login. All router brands have a default login
So if it’s your parents computer and they got a password, you don’t technically need theirs.
Just type in for the User: Admin
and for the Password: password
Should let you login, if not google your router brands default login.
After that click advanced settings depending on your router.
Portforwarding/Triggering> Make a new exception named “RSPS” port start 43594 port end 43594
Then go to canyouseeme.org check port 43594
Some people aren’t able to portforward btw it’s because some routers don’t support port 43594
But you can always open uTorrent > Preferences > port 43594

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

www.portforward.com

Then when you’re done portforwarding, check to see if you did it correctly:
www.canyouseeme.org
